name: startupnamer-ai
description: StartupNamer.ai - The AI-powered startup naming authority

scripts.dev: echo 'Use npm run dev from client or server directories'
scripts.info: echo 'Client: cd client && npm start | Server: cd server && npm run dev'
scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd client && npm run format && cd ../server && npm run format
scripts.validate: cd client && npm run validate:html && npm run validate:seo
scripts.ci:quality: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.ci:build: npm run build && npm run validate
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run test
